title: Ep 19: Toppy in a Jalopy
description:
Today's Proceedings:  Two bros engaged in a chili eating contest, a man getting sloppy in a jalopy with some unexpected guests, and a couple of pranksters who take it too far.  We also share stories of the Judgies getting scammed!  

Rate and Review our podcast and share it with your friends!

Follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/judgiespod

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod

Music by: Iván

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg

Logo/Designs by:

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support
